title: QbD-driven Formulation Development and Evaluation of Genistein Nanoparticles for Prostate Cancer.
abstract: Genistein (GEN) shows significant anticancer potential, particularly against prostate cancer. However, its clinical application is limited by poor water solubility, rapid metabolism and excretion, low bioavailability, and lack of targeted delivery to cancer cells, hindering its effectiveness as a chemopreventive or therapeutic agent.
journal: Recent advances in drug delivery and formulation
